text: (Napiye!) Ivarkal pumiyil currit tiriyavillaiya? (Tirintiruntal) ivarkalukku munniruntavarkalin mutivu evvaru ayirru enpataik kantukolvarkal. (Munnirunta) avarkalo, palattalum, pumiyil vittuc cenra (purva) cinnankalalum ivarkalaivita mikaittavarkalakave iruntanar. (Eninum,) avarkalin pavankalin karanamaka avarkalai allah pitittuk kontan. Allahvin pitiyiliruntu avarkalai patukattuk kolla oruvarum irukkavillai
